extendedInfo.description: The definitive Automotive Android App for Indian Car Lovers for Free! This App is useful in case you own a car, are planning to buy a car, are fond of cars, or just like to keep yourself updated about the Indian Car Industry news, updates & fresh launches.The App has come up with the biggest update till date. The most remarkable features added to the latest version are:Car ComparisonTools like Car Maintenance Tracker, Fuel Estimation Tool and EMI CalculatorCar Insurance Agents ListingCar Accessory Dealers ListingCar Deals on new cars from participating car dealershipsUser Reviews on CarsTop 10 Rated Cars by UsersNow you can read Car News without internetNow, it isn't just about your love for cars but also on how much you care for your car & what all can you do to get yourself a car in one app- Car Experts India.Tired of browsing through several websites/phone calls/magazines to find Car Dealers, Specs, Ex-Showroom prices, images, deals, etc.? Our goal was to ensure you do not have to go through all that anymore â hence our free Android App allowing you free access to the required information. Car Experts is Indiaâs one & only free mobile app to help Indian car enthusiasts, car buyers, car lovers, car owners access car reviews, car specifications & car dealers information easily. It is the first application to provide comprehensive information with regard to prices of Indian cars on a city level basis, across India along with the latest news from the world of cars.No service in the Indian market as yet provides information where a customer can know the Ex-showroom price for their own city and hence can call or reach out to the dealer. Car Expert provides information like Car Features, Technical Specs, Ex-Showroom Prices for each city and Showroom details at one place.Car Experts India also provides the following information:Detailed info on all car models available in IndiaEx-showroom prices of cars across the countryContact details of car dealers for any cityTechnical specifications of all carsCar images with remarkable zoom facilityCar News for access to latest Indian Auto Industry newsAn additional Car Pictures gallery to browse through huge collection of photosSocial Media integration for Facebook & Twitter addicts! Easily share the content with your friendsShare Feature to mail Car related news to your friends easilyWith an interactive and user-friendly interface,the app connects users and car dealers enabling buyers and sellers to exchange useful information on car deals on a single platform.Users install this leading Indian Auto App once and get a myriad of info about cars available in India. This includes, but not limited to - Indian Cars & Auto news and Indian Car PicturesWould you rather move through the Indian traffic in style? Simply install our App and read Indian car reviews as well as advice on buying/owning/modifying cars. We also cover Super Cars, Vintage Cars & Classic Cars. Or perhaps you are looking to buy a used car for the time being? The app has news integration from our blog where we occasionally covers tips & best practices on searching for used cars or used cars dealers.The passion about Cars in general, and Indian Cars in particular ensures our Team knows BHP, Torque, Mileage and even the smallest of technical specifications about Indian Cars which is presented to you either through the App or the blog.Like to follow your preferred Car Brands? We cover that too! Below is a partial list of Auto Brands which our App covers:Aston MartinAudiBMWBentleyChevroletFerrariFiatForceFordHondaHyundaiJaguarLamborghiniLand RoverMahindraMaruti SuzukiMercedes-BenzMitsubishiNissanPorscheRenaultRolls-RoyceSkodaSsangyongTataToyotaVolkswagenVolvoThis App is useful for users searching for: Indian Vehicles, Indian Auto, Indian Automotive, Indian Motor vehicles, Indian Four Wheelers, Indian Automobile, Indian Apps, Apps India, India Apps.

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Its really nice app, thanks guys good work, keep it up, so much of information at one glance, very useful.
reviews.author: santosh nalawade

reviews.title: Keeps saying \"fetching data\"
reviews.comment: When i try to find any car it selects d manufacturer n the car but when i click on model it says fetching data n does nothing. I would like to tell the developers of this app that i have a 3g connection n all apps run just fine except your app..
reviews.author: pushkar kulkarni

reviews.title: Providing a search option could be handy...
reviews.comment: When going through the reviews, it becomes tough to search for the car which I want to view. In this case search option comes quite handy.
reviews.author: Nikhil Thakur

reviews.title: Excellent app !
reviews.comment: This is worth an app..... and its free.... I can keep track of my car maintenance, fuel efficiency, insurance renewals.....etc.....great...
reviews.author: Rajat Pendharkar

reviews.title: Innovative
reviews.comment: It is a great initiative. This app is made with a lot of though and reflects great dedication. Services and option provided are amazing. Will like to see the developer of this app challenging himself for better. (\",)
reviews.author: Himanshu Chauhan

reviews.title: Very good but something lacking
reviews.comment: It has nice information but some info are not just up to date and there us no expert analysis and verdict in this app like available on cardekho.com. Comparison of cars is not up to the mark. Needs to improve. Otherwise a good app
reviews.author: Nikhil Bagaria

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Excellent.But with more varieties of cars comparison can be extended to atleast 5 models

reviews.title: Bestest App Ever
reviews.comment: You cannot ask for a better app. Well done guys!! Every information at one place.

reviews.title: Poor content
reviews.comment: Good layout.  Simple reader.  Nice color scheme, needs frequently updated content. Car news is all about reviews & this app fails right there.

In fact what are you selected earlier are disappearing why the hell does like this the developer should look into this and solve the problem.bye.
